availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, resident. Lincoln County native. Son of Lucy Ann Bowlin Ends and William Ends Sr. Resident in Lincoln County in 1860. Reportedly served with the Hall’s Gap Battalion of the Kentucky State Guard by May 27, 1865, probably with his older brother, William Ends Jr., who had enrolled on November 1, 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 81. Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), 792. Find A Grave, “H. T. Ends, (1856-1934)" Memorial #60246996, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/60246996# (accessed June 8, 2018).
